item.title: Dharoks GreatAxe stance messed up?
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

317 Delta
Okay so I used SilentCJ’s guide on 100% working godsword stances, blocking anims etc.
Well Apparently my Dharoks Greataxe stance was effected. I need the getstandanim int id #

This is my code (The godsword stances are under the dharoks axe.)

if(id == 4718) // dharoks axe { return 2065; } if(id == 746 || id == 667 || id == 35 || id == 2402 || id == 11011 || id == 11001 || id == 7808 || id == 7668) { return 2065; }

Read full topic
